Headline: #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood Temporary Southbound Reroute near 53rd/Ellis
ShortDescription: Southbound 172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted via Woodlawn, 55th and Ellis: due to, street blockage near 53rd/Ellis.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #172 U. of Chicago/Kenwood buses are temporarily rerouted via Woodlawn, 55th and Ellis: due to, street blockage near 53rd/Ellis.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute at 75th/Kingston
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Coles, 76th, Yates & 75th, due to street blockage near 75th/Kingston.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 75th, Coles, 76th, Yates and 75th, due to street blockage near 75th/Kingston.

Allow extra travel time.
